mapper.select: select count(*) from book_info where bi_name like #{keyword}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_info (bi_ci_seq, bi_name, bi_code, bi_company, bi_status, bi_stock, bi_pub_dt, bi_writer, bi_point, bi_mod_dt) VALUES(#{bi_ci_seq}, #{bi_name}, #{bi_code}, #{bi_company}, #{bi_status}, #{bi_stock}, #{bi_pub_dt}, #{bi_writer}, #{bi_point}, NOW());
mapper.select: select a.*, b.cate_name as bi_cate_name from book_info a left outer join category_info b on a.bi_ci_seq = b.cate_seq where bi_seq=#{seq}
mapper.update: update book_info set bi_name=#{bi_name}, bi_code=#{bi_code}, bi_company=#{bi_company}, bi_status=#{bi_status}, bi_writer=#{bi_writer}, bi_point=#{bi_point}, bi_mod_dt=NOW() where bi_seq=#{bi_seq}
mapper.select: select bi_seq, bi_name from book_info where bi_name like #{keyword}
select bi_seq from book_info order by bi_seq desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert INTO bookstore_work_db.book_history(bkh_type, bkh_content, bkh_book_seq) VALUES(#{bkh_type}, #{bkh_content}, #{bkh_book_seq})
